column3: あの世で総長に詫びるがいい！
column4:
You can offer your apologies to
Master Kohga in person!

column3:
コーガ様って素敵よねぇ
あのポッコリしたお腹… うっとりしちゃうわ
column4:
Isn't Master Kohga just so dreamy?
I could stare at that poochy tummy of his
all day long...

column3:
ウソっ知らないの？
いいわ…教えてあげる
コーガ様… それは
column4:
What? There's no way you don't know
about him! How could anyone not know
about him...

column3:
勇者を倒すため数々のシーカー奥義を会得した
我らがイーガ団の総長のことよ！
column4:
He's the leader of the Yiga Clan, master
of countless Sheikah secrets and sworn
enemy of a hero thought long dead!

column3:
忘れたとは言わせない！
貴様が倒した イーガ団の総長のことよ！
column4:
How dare you forget the name of the
man you defeated! Show him honor,
even in defeat!

column3: 真の美しさを知らぬ おろかなやつめ…
column4:
You filth! You have no appreciation for
true beauty!

column3:
コーガ様を倒しただけでは飽き足らず
愚弄するつもりかっ！
column4:
So your plan was not simply to defeat
Master Kohga but to mock him as well?

column3:
何度でも聞くわ
コーガ様って素敵よねぇ
column4:
I'll ask you as many times as it takes!
Isn't Master Kohga really dreamy?
